description: A moisture-rich conditioner. Contains moisturizing agents of quinoa, an ancient grain found in the Andes Mountains of South America. Delivers Silk Protein to reconstruct damaged areas and reinforce hair's strength. Blended with Maracuja Oil derived from the pressed kernels of passion fruit seeds. Rich in Vitamins A and C to treat dry scalp and encourage healthy hair growth. Hair appears softer, smoother, more vigorous and manageable.
